Articles.Content: Are we not alowd to upload a profile pick???? I can't seem to find the option I found were. You need at least five posts in non-Offtopic threads before they let you set an avatar.
ya the problem was i was on my phone I got on my laptop and bam problem gone i forget that some things dont work on my phone so i find myself asking silly questions at wrong times
